title: Google\Cloud\TextToSpeech\V1\SynthesizeLongAudioRequest
name: SynthesizeLongAudioRequest
description:
The top-level message sent by the client for the SynthesizeLongAudio method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.texttospeech.v1.SynthesizeLongAudioRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: The resource states of the request in the form of projects/*/locations/*/voices/*.

params.name: data.input
params.description: Required. The Synthesizer requires either plain text or SSML as input.

params.name: data.audio_config
params.description: Required. The configuration of the synthesized audio.

params.name: data.output_gcs_uri
params.description: Specifies a Cloud Storage URI for the synthesis results. Must be specified in the format: gs://bucket_name/object_name, and the bucket must already exist.

params.name: data.voice
params.description: The desired voice of the synthesized audio.
